articles.title: Some Americans are misusing bleach to fight coronavirus, CDC finds - WGN TV Chicago
articles.description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention says Americans are misusing bleach in the fight against the coronavirus. The new research, published Friday in the CDC’s weekly health report, was based on an online panel survey of 502 adults in May of this year…
